sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Container, Typography, Box, Button, TextField, Grid } from '@mui/material'; import Navbar from '../components/navbar'; import paynow from "../assets/PaynowQR.png" import background from "../assets/PaymentBackground.jpg" const PaymentPage = () => { return ( <> Payment Page Choose your payment method and complete the transaction. {/* Payment options */} Credit Card PayNow ); }; export default PaymentPage;
